trans-unit.source: Represents the smallest and largest possible paragraph width that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: 表示可完全包含指定的文本内容的最小和最大可能的段落宽度。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否等于当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要与当前比较<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 等同于当前对象; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: If obj is not a object, is returned.
trans-unit.target: If obj is not a object, is returned.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>等同于当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref>要与当前比较<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: if value is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 等同于当前对象; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用作哈希函数<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 它是适合在哈希算法和数据结构，如哈希表中使用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值表示当前对象的哈希代码。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the largest paragraph width possible that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: 获取最大的段落宽度可能完全可以包含指定的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the largest paragraph width possible.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示最大可能的段落宽度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the smallest paragraph width possible that can fully contain the specified text content.
trans-unit.target: 获取最小段落宽度可能完全可以包含指定的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: The minimum paragraph width corresponds to the word that has the greatest width in the text content.
trans-unit.target: 最小段落宽度对应于在的文本内容中具有最大宽度的单词。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the smallest paragraph width possible.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示可能的最小段落宽度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>字符串是否相等。

trans-unit.target: 第二个实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Compare two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> objects for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>对象是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The objects are equal if their <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MinWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MaxWidth%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 对象相等，如果其<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MinWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MaxWidth%2A>属性是否相等。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MaxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.MinMaxParagraphWidth.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.target: 第二个实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>进行比较。
